description.value: The jiang-shi ignores difficult terrain and effects that would render them @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Prone]. A jiang-shi can't take the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Drop Prone] action. When they @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Leap] they don't trigger reactions that are normally triggered by move actions, such as Attacks of Opportunity.
